title: Tiles Service: New mixed WvW map

comments.author: darthmaim.6017
comments.body: The tile service will be updated once Lawton is back from his vacation.

comments.author: potatofarms.9241
comments.body: I would also like this to be updated.

comments.author: Shtra Quo.1932
comments.body: The WvW-API is working, but the Tiles service still delivers the old map.
